“We will not raise interest rates pre-emptively because we fear the possible onset of inflation. We will wait for evidence of actual inflation or other imbalances." - J. Powell

Inflation over the last year...
Home Prices: +19.5%
Rents: +17.8%
PPI: +9.6%
CPI: +6.8%
PCE: +5.7%
